description:
At Larson Law Firm P.C., we have two office locations in western North Dakota, including one in Minot, from which we proudly serve the residents of the area who find themselves suffering after accidents rooted in negligence. Our founding attorney, Mark V. Larson, established our law firm in 1979. In the more than 35 years that have passed since our doors first opened, we have built a reputation for providing aggressive yet compassionate representation to clients in personal injury cases related to:

  • Oilfield and farm accidents
  • Car, truck and motorcycle accidents
  • Electrocution and burn injuries
  • Wrongful death
  • Traumatic brain injuries

Mr. Larson is a North Dakota native who understands the trials that the people of the state face, especially in the workplace. In fact, he has represented countless victims of oilfield accidents, along with victims of car accidents involving vehicles transporting oil and heavy equipment.

If you sustained an injury or lost a loved one to an accident caused by another party's negligence, look no further than Larson Law Firm P.C. for the help you need to pursue personal injury or wrongful death compensation. Our attorneys will take the time to hear your story, examine the details of the accident and thoroughly explain your legal options. By taking advantage of our free initial consultation, you can take the first step toward financial security.
